name: typescript_uplift
description: A deliberately suboptimal TypeScript app for demonstration purposes

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/modern-ui.css dist/ && cp not-backed.png dist/ && cp -r src/i18n dist/ && mkdir -p dist/data && cp src/data/inventory.json dist/data/ && cp -r inventory dist/
scripts.dev: tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/modern-ui.css dist/ && cp not-backed.png dist/ && cp -r src/i18n dist/ && mkdir -p dist/data && cp src/data/inventory.json dist/data/ && cp -r inventory dist/ && concurrently "tsc --watch" "browser-sync start --no-open --server dist --files 'dist/**/*'"
scripts.reset: git reset --hard HEAD && rm -rf DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md DEV_PLAN.md
